title: ZenPkgs Browser v1.0 Release
content:
## Welp, it's finally officially out
 Yeah, the versions you saw until now were just betas, I didn't want to call it a 1.0 until we had mobile UI.
 Either way, it's feature-packed with stuff like
 - a tree-based option and package browsing UI
 - lazy loading and virtual options (performance stuff)
 - a mobile view
 - a scratchpad with some niceties
 - accent colors
 - clanker features
 - reduced motion
 - keyboard navigation
 - custom CSS
 - local JSON support
 - diffs against other versions of zenpkgs
 - news
 - favorites
 - search
 - recents
 - command palette
 - random package or option picker.

 yeah, that's a LOT.
 i hope you have as much fun using it as i had making it.
 oh and btw, surprisingly enough, even though it's clanker-made (i know, cringe, i will rewrite it in svelte without using AI later but for now it'll suffice), it's actually quite good. i guess the only issue is that it's impossible to maintain.
 like actually impossible to maintain lmfao.

anyways, enough yapping, i hope you enjoy ZenOS and ZenPkgs search.
